content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're thinking of ways to make the scavenger hunt more engaging and challenging for your niece. Remember to have fun and be flexible – the goal is to create an enjoyable experience that encourages exploration, learning, and bonding.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you and your niece have an amazing time on your nature-themed scavenger hunt adventure!
